sections.title: Introduction
paragraphs: The most comprehensive immigration, relocation, and Brazil travel planning partner for people who want a clear, lawful, and human path forward.

sections.title: Our story
paragraphs: We began after helping a friend relocate from Canada to São Paulo. The process was overwhelming: scattered requirements, unclear timelines, and missing local context. We built a checklist to solve one move. That checklist became a framework, then a service, and finally a full company dedicated to Brazil immigration and travel planning.

Today, we support families, professionals, entrepreneurs, retirees, students, and travelers who want confident, compliant outcomes. Our work blends strategy, documentation, logistics, and local expertise across all 27 states.
End-to-end support from eligibility to arrival
State-by-state insight for housing, schools, and healthcare
Legal and document compliance built into every step
Transparent timelines, pricing, and expectations

paragraphs: Visa-path analysis, eligibility scoring, and step-by-step planning for work, study, family reunification, retirement, and investment.
Checklists, legalizations, translations, and consular submissions that match the latest official requirements.
Federal Police scheduling, CPF guidance, residency registration, and local compliance timelines.
Housing, banking, healthcare access, school options, and settlement plans tailored to your state and city.
Visitor visa guidance, travel compliance, itinerary planning, and safety briefings for long stays and business travel.
Renewals, status changes, document updates, and family expansions.

sections.title: Our expertise
paragraphs: We stay current on consular and immigration policy updates and build every case around official checklists and proven workflows. We also maintain localized guidance for each state, including the cities with the most reliable services for new residents.
We do not promise outcomes we cannot control. We do promise preparation, clarity, and strong documentation.
